summary: reduce the number of nirnroot required to finish the quest
descriptionHtml:
[color=#b6b6b6]Personally i've tried some of alternative QN mods like markers (which is buggy and/or don't work), and laser shooting nirnroot (not really lore friendly), and decided to try my own spinn-off of this.[/color]
[b]
[/b][size=3][b]Basically, this mod will simply reduce the number of red-weed you need to collect and deliver, to finish the quest and get your reward.[/b]
[/size]
[color=#b6b6b6][size=2][b][u]There are two version of this mod:[/u][/b][/size][/color]
1. You will need to find only 10, instead of 30, which imo, is totally lore friendly and still very simple enough without markers.
2. You will need only 1 plant, which is located in the exact same room, where the quest will start, for those who really really hate the quest.

[i][color=#999999]It is likely, that you will need a new game save, but not necessarily.[/color][/i]
author: egovir
